Sentencas: In the present study, three-dimensional numerical simulations are carried out to predict the electrochemical characteristics of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathodes based on a coupled method using sub-grid scale (SGS) model in a lattice Boltzmann method (LBM).
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation of solid oxide fuel cell cathode based on lattice Boltzmann method with sub-grid scale models

Sentencas: Lattice Boltzmann method is used to solve the governing equations.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation of solid oxide fuel cell cathode based on lattice Boltzmann method with sub-grid scale models

Sentencas: In each coarse computational grid, local gas diffusivities, ion and electron conductivities are obtained by directly solving diffusion equations using the original fine sub-grid scale information.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation of solid oxide fuel cell cathode based on lattice Boltzmann method with sub-grid scale models

Sentencas: Two types of SGS models are introduced in this study, i.e. isotropic and anisotropic local diffusivities and conductivities.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation of solid oxide fuel cell cathode based on lattice Boltzmann method with sub-grid scale models

Sentencas: Proposed SGS local diffusivities and conductivities can maintain detailed information of the original fine microstructure even when coarser grid is used in the calculation.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation of solid oxide fuel cell cathode based on lattice Boltzmann method with sub-grid scale models

Sentencas: In the anisotropic SGS model, weighted summation of particle distribution function is applied in the LBM to maintain the invariances of local concentrations and potentials.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation of solid oxide fuel cell cathode based on lattice Boltzmann method with sub-grid scale models

Sentencas: From the tortuosity factor and overpotential calculation results, it is concluded that the proposed SGS models can drastically improve the computational accuracy without costing additional calculation time.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation of solid oxide fuel cell cathode based on lattice Boltzmann method with sub-grid scale models

Sentencas: Moreover, SGS model considering geometric anisotropies inside the calculation grid presents more precise results than the isotropic SGS model.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation of solid oxide fuel cell cathode based on lattice Boltzmann method with sub-grid scale models
